name: Luke Brock
details: Small range Dental Clinic. Separate doctor arrangement for Men's & Ladies. They have also kids care arrangement. Dental Surgery with medium range cost. Very Good Service. Behaviour of all stuff & nurse are good. Me & my hole family taking dental treatment from here.

name: Wilma Maxwell
details: Doctors are good and their service is also good. Specially Dr.Mehedi and Dr. Simia Taher. They are very knowledgeable.

name: Randy Barker
details: This dental care doctors have a good knowledge of dental issue and treatment. This dental care is well decorated, Without compromising their treatment, maintaining hygiene. Wish this care success in succession.
